dcterms:creator: Z. Zhang
C. Lin
dcterms:description: A public dataset containing 700 gastric histopathology images stained by H&E, used to build and evaluate the proposed HCRF-AM model. The images include 140 normal and 560 abnormal images, with corresponding ground truth images marked by pathologists.
dcterms:title: Gastric Histopathology Dataset

dcterms:creator: J. Deng
W. Dong
R. Socher
L. Li
K. Li
L. Fei-Fei
dcterms:description: A large-scale hierarchical image database used for training deep learning models, including the VGG-16 network for gastric histopathology image classification.
dcterms:title: ImageNet

dcterms:creator: Z. Song
S. Zou
W. Zhou
Y. Huang
L. Shao
J. Yuan
X. Gou
W. Jin
Z. Wang
X. Chen
dcterms:description: A dataset containing Haematoxylin and Eosin (H&E) stained whole slide images (WSIs) used for clinically applicable histopathological diagnosis system for gastric cancer detection using deep learning.
dcterms:title: Haematoxylin and Eosin (H&E) Stained WSIs
